name: Ronnie Craig
bio: Hi, I’m Ronnie! I scaled an eCommerce biz to $14K/month in under a year, grew a YouTube channel to 1K subs in 30 days, booked 28 daycare appointments in 6 days, and built automations for nurses to track clients. I help you create content, repurpose high-performing posts, schedule with ease, monitor trends, and automate marketing—so you stay visible and consistent without burning out.
